group_1.textRight: Especially the ending, where the timid and@always trembling Bull-Bull-Dog...
Jumped out from behind a tree, with a reckless,@all-out attack.
I got goosebumps and cried at the same time!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*

group_1.textRight: …Sana?

group_1.textLeft: Me too…when I watched that scene, a long@time ago… I also loved it…

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* It was the best, wasn't it?
Did you watch the director's interview in@the bonus footage?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I only watched that movie once,@when I was little.
So I don't know about the extras…

group_1.textRight: The interview was also interesting.
For example, for the ending, it seems Director@Nekoyanagi based it on his own childhood.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh?!
(…I see…)
(I was desperate back then…)
(Today, my reckless actions…)
(It might have been inspired by the animated@movie I watched as a child…)
(And if that was based on the director's@experience…)

group_1.textRight: Um, Sana…

group_1.textLeft: Ah…sorry, I keep getting lost in thought…
Um…thank you very much…

group_1.textRight: Thank you…? I see.
Something must have happened, but it looks@like you're alright now.

group_1.textLeft: …I'm not sure…
But…

group_1.textRight: Nemu, can I talk to you…?

group_1.textLeft: Hm? …Oh, Sana.
What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: Nemu, when it comes to cartoons, novels,@and picture books...
Do you think that…they have the power to@move people in real life…?

group_1.textLeft: …[wait:0.8][chara:101471:cheek_0][chara:101471:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101471:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*
I was wondering what you were up to all@of a sudden.
What happened?
Did people who don't think highly of your@creations say something to you?

group_1.textRight: Well…

group_1.textLeft: In that case, you can just take their words@as they are.
According to them, exciting scenes supposedly@leave a bad influence on children.
They acknowledge the fact that creativity has@the power to change reality.

group_1.textRight: …Ah, I see…

group_1.textLeft: It's a bit of a cowardly argument, though.

group_1.textRight: No, thank you…

group_1.textLeft: Did you start to doubt the power of creativity?

group_1.textRight: Just a little this morning.
Picture books, whether you're making them@or reading them...
I thought that they were just an escape@from reality.
Suddenly, I felt anxious…
And I couldn't draw anymore.
So, today...
I focused on the real world, and took action.
But that didn't go well, besides one moment…
…But, that moment...
It might have been influenced by the animated@movie I watched when I was little.

group_1.textCenter: Even if all the Magical Girls end up disliking me,@I'm determined to proceed.

group_1.textRight: But, if we did something unnecessary and@caused her pain…
Then we should tell the truth and apologize…

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's true…

group_1.textCenter: Well, whatever. Thanks to both of you,
I was happy to be able to talk to my mommy@and daddy again!
There's mourning to forget, but for this…
I want to mourn to remember, not to forget.
Regardless of karma, atonement, and all that,
Shizuka is also human, after all…

group_1.textRight: Picture books are not an escape from reality…
For people who live earnestly in reality,
they can act as inspiration for them…
That's what I want to believe…

group_1.textLeft: Indeed…I agree with you.
Oh, right. This might be a good time.
Touka is doing various things on social media,
but it doesn't seem to be going well…
How about trying to utilize this?

group_1.textRight: What do you mean by that…?

group_1.textLeft: Why don't you ask Touka to create an e-book@of your illustrations and publish it?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: It might be a sudden proposal, but…

group_1.textRight: Well…
Yeah, I'd like to try that…
I'll do my best!
